Key Match Events: Jose Iglesias unified the team and got the city to buy into something bigger
Post-Match Reflections: Nick Castellanos gave the Mets credit for their good play in the series
Castellanos said the Phillies were the better team overall, but the Mets were better in the series
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets will advance to the NLCS for the first time since 2015
Nick Castellanos had seven hits in 17 at-bats during the NLDS with a batting average of.412
Others: There is some feeling that things could change after this season for the Phillies
